com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.configuration

Interface EndpointSecurityConfigurer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpringMVCTestObjects.ClientSideTestConfiguration

    public interface EndpointSecurityConfigurer
    Implement this interface to add more security configurations to your paths. Do not use core Spring classes like WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter or XML <http> elements, as it will create another filter chain that will either
    • Overwrite all the security configurations
    • Do nothing at all
    Neither of those options are desirable. This interface respects order by either adding the @Order annotation or by implementing org.springframework.core.Ordered
    Author:
    Josh Ghiloni

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(HttpSecurity http)
      Any changes made to the HttpSecurity object here will affect the main filter chain used by this library.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(HttpSecurity http)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Any changes made to the HttpSecurity object here will affect the main filter chain used by this library. Use with caution.
        Parameters:
        http - the HttpSecurity object representing all opinionated endpoints
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something goes awry
